field.name: summary
field.value: TemplateEngine - Replace project dependencies with assembly dependencies

field.name: description
field.value: This patch is to replace the project dependencies that exist in the TemplateEngine solution with dependencies on the compiled assemblies instead. The solution is currently dependent on NVelocity.dll and Castle.Core.dll.

comment.author: roelofb
comment.text: What's the advantage of this patch?

comment.author: jsimons
comment.text: Apart from faster compiles well, With projects starting to get released, I want to be in control of what version TemplateEngine is built against, eg: version 2.0 of Core or trunk, or RC3, .... Also, why have access to the source of dependent projects from within this solution? If I want to update the Core or NVelocity source than I would open the relevant solutions so that I can run unit test. Lastly, I can still step into for debugging purposes if I really want.
